comments.name: Bessie Cooper
comments.comment: I think for our second compaign we can try to target a different audience. How does it sound for you?

replies.name: Marvin McKinney
replies.comment: Yes, that sounds good! I can think about this tomorrow. When we plan to start that compaign?

replies.name: Bessie Cooper
replies.comment: We plan to run the compaign on Friday - as far as I know. Do you think you will get this done by Thursday @Marvin?

comments.name: Marvin McKinney
comments.comment: The first compaign went smoothly. Please make sure to see all attachments with the results to understand the flow

comments.name: Savannah Nguyen
comments.comment: We have just published the first compaign. Let's see the results in 5 days and we will iterate on this.
